description:
Join Phileas Fogg and his faithful companion Passepartout on their adventurous journey around the world in 80 days!

Collect all items you need for the adventure by creating rows of three from identical symbols. By removing the symbols the individual parts of the artifacts end up in your suitcase. Mighty bonus items - like fireballs and bombs - help you reach the destinations of your journey on time!

More than 80 levels per journey 2 player mode with two Nintendo DS Repeat the journey to discover more difficult levels Upright mode for right and left handers Several great bonus items with microphone support
name: Around the World in 80 Days
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
